title: Haus Nummer 6 Affair
content:
Hello Typophiles,   
   
 [Haus Nummer 6 Affair](http://web.archive.org/web/20050902122400/http:/www.xtati.com/haus6/) is a gig I started in hope to decorate the dull walls of the house I live in - am actually renting a corner there, with a lamp and a sink. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050902122400im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) I would be very glad to be able to hang the works of the real typophiles on the walls of the stair-way. I am even eager to give a typeface for this.   
   
You are all heartily welcome.
author: popovich

comments.content:
Can an entry be a photo (with some text)?   
   
hhp

Hallo Hrant,   
   
sure it can. The problem is that if it is meant to be printed afterwards I will ask for a 300dpi file, which in case of being A4 format could be a bit large. But if the file size is not a problem for you, it is not a problem for me. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050902122400im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Cheers!

I am bumping it up to see if more typophiles would want to take part or to (at least) vote for the entries (and maybe even comment on them), which have been submitted by now.   
   
Hope, you don't see this as an annoying message announcing yet another boring thing. :/   
   
Alex
